verses.text: In the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* that \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* \w died|strong="H4194"\w* I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* upon a \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w high|strong="H7311"\w* and lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and his \w train|strong="H7757"\w* \w filled|strong="H4392"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft his…: or, the skirts thereof\f*

\w Above|strong="H4605"\w* it \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* the \w seraphims|strong="H8314"\w*: each \w one|strong="H0259"\w* had \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*; with \w twain|strong="H8147"\w* he \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and with \w twain|strong="H8147"\w* he \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and with \w twain|strong="H8147"\w* he did \w fly|strong="H5774"\w*.

And one \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto another, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* of his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.\f + \fr 6.3 \ft one…: Heb. this cried to this\f*\f + \fr 6.3 \ft the whole…: Heb. his glory is the fulness of the whole earth\f*

And the \w posts|strong="H0520"\w* of the \w door|strong="H5592"\w* \w moved|strong="H5128"\w* at the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of him that \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* was \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft door: Heb. thresholds\f*

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* \add is\add* me! for I am \w undone|strong="H1820"\w*; because I \add am\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, and I \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*: for mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft undone: Heb. cut off\f*

Then \w flew|strong="H5774"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w seraphims|strong="H8314"\w* unto me, having a live \w coal|strong="H7531"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \add which\add* he had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* with the \w tongs|strong="H4457"\w* from off the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:\f + \fr 6.6 \ft having…: Heb. and in his hand a live coal\f*

And he \w laid|strong="H5060"\w* \add it\add* upon my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Lo, this hath \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*; and thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* is taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, and thy \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w purged|strong="H3722"\w*.\f + \fr 6.7 \ft laid…: Heb. caused it to touch\f*

Also I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Whom shall I \w send|strong="H7971"\w*, and who will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* for us? Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, Here \add am\add* I; \w send|strong="H7971"\w* me.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft Here…: Heb. behold me\f*

¶ And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w indeed|strong="H8085"\w*, but \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* not; and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* ye \w indeed|strong="H7200"\w*, but \w perceive|strong="H3045"\w* not.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft indeed, but understand: or, without ceasing, etc: Heb. in hearing, etc\f*

Make the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fat|strong="H8080"\w*, and make their \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*, and \w shut|strong="H8173"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*; lest they \w see|strong="H7200"\w* with their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* with their \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* with their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and \w convert|strong="H7725"\w*, and be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, how long? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Until the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* be \w wasted|strong="H7582"\w* without \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*, and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* without \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* be \w utterly|strong="H8077"\w* \w desolate|strong="H7582"\w*,\f + \fr 6.11 \ft utterly…: Heb. desolate with desolation\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w removed|strong="H7368"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* far \w away|strong="H7368"\w*, and \add there be\add* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w forsaking|strong="H5805"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ But yet in it \add shall be\add* a \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w*, and \add it\add* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and shall be \w eaten|strong="H1197"\w*: as a teil \w tree|strong="H0424"\w*, and as an \w oak|strong="H0437"\w*, whose \w substance|strong="H4678"\w* \add is\add* in them, when they \w cast|strong="H7995"\w* \add their leaves: so\add* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w substance|strong="H4678"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 6.13 \ft and it…: or, when it is returned, and hath been broused\f*\f + \fr 6.13 \ft substance: or, stock, or, stem\f*
